enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
section_title: OFFER TO HOST COP 12 AND COP/MOP 2
sentences: During the closing session of COP 11, Kenya announced its offer to host COP 12 and COP/MOP 2.
The Secretariat will report back to parties by February 2006.
